title: Portfolio Website
summary: A modern portfolio website built with Astro, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and powered by a CMS.
description:
This portfolio website represents a complete full-stack project showcasing modern web development practices. Built with Astro for optimal performance, it features a custom content management system using Keystatic, a comprehensive component library, and interactive animations using PixiJS.

The site demonstrates expertise in:
- Modern static site generation with Astro
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Custom CMS development
- Component library architecture
- Performance optimization
- SEO best practices

All source code is available for review, demonstrating clean architecture, comprehensive documentation, and modern development workflows.
